text: Na thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 35. I will not eat almsfood taking mouthfuls from a heap: a training to be observed.
๓๕. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่ขยุมลงแต่ยอดฉันบิณฑบาต”
35. I shall not eat the alms-food working down from the top: this is a training to be done.
